turkish_example_sentence: Önemli haberi duymayıp toplantıyı kaçırdı ne yazık ki.
english_example_sentence: Not having heard the important news, he unfortunately missed the meeting.
russian_example_sentence: Не услышав важную новость, он, к сожалению, пропустил собрание.
